entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Slave Lake Airport 04:56 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
